description.zh-cn: 中国共产党创始人之一，早期中国工人运动领袖。
description.en: One of the founders of the Communist Party of China and an early leader of the Chinese workers' movement.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党创始人之一，与王尽美共同在山东地区开展早期革命活动。
description.en: One of the founders of the Communist Party of China, who co-organized early revolutionary activities in Shandong with Wang Jinmei.

description.zh-cn: 俄国共产主义革命家、政治家和政治理论家，曾接见过王尽美。
description.en: A Russian communist revolutionary, politician, and political theorist who met with Wang Jinmei.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，曾与王尽美共同负责中国劳动组合书记部的领导工作。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China, who once shared leadership responsibilities for the China Labour Union Secretariat with Wang Jinmei.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治家、革命家，中国国民党创始人。曾约见王尽美并委派其为国民会议宣传员特派员。
description.en: A modern Chinese statesman, revolutionary, and founder of the Kuomintang. He met with Wang Jinmei and appointed him as a special commissioner for promoting the National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 王尽美长子，曾任吉林省军区副司令员。
description.en: The eldest son of Wang Jinmei, who served as the deputy commander of the Jilin Provincial Military District.

description.zh-cn: 王尽美次子，曾任上海市交通工作委员会党委副书记。
description.en: The second son of Wang Jinmei, who served as the deputy party secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Transportation Work Committee.

description.zh-cn: 介绍王乃征加入中国共产党的两人之一。
description.en: One of the two individuals who introduced Wang Naizheng to the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 介绍王乃征加入中国共产党的两人之一。
description.en: One of the two individuals who introduced Wang Naizheng to the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 王尽美之孙，王乃征之子。
description.en: Grandson of Wang Jinmei and son of Wang Naizheng.

description.zh-cn: 王尽美之孙，王乃征之子。
description.en: Grandson of Wang Jinmei and son of Wang Naizheng.

description.zh-cn: 王尽美之孙女，王乃征之女，儿科医师。
description.en: Granddaughter of Wang Jinmei and daughter of Wang Naizheng, a pediatrician.

description.zh-cn: 王尽美之孙，王乃恩之子，浙江大学信息学院教授。
description.en: Grandson of Wang Jinmei and son of Wang Nai'en, a professor at the College of Information Science and Electronic Engineering, Zhejiang University.

description.zh-cn: 王尽美之孙/孙女，王乃恩之子/女。
description.en: Grandchild of Wang Jinmei and child of Wang Nai'en.

description.zh-cn: 王尽美之孙/孙女，王乃恩之子/女。
description.en: Grandchild of Wang Jinmei and child of Wang Nai'en.

description.zh-cn: 王尽美之孙女，王乃恩之女，解放军第二军医大学长征医院教授。
description.en: Granddaughter of Wang Jinmei and daughter of Wang Nai'en, a professor at Changzheng Hospital, Second Military Medical University.

description.zh-cn: 王尽美之曾孙/曾孙女，王明华之子/女。
description.en: Great-grandchild of Wang Jinmei and child of Wang Minghua.

description.zh-cn: 王尽美之曾孙/曾孙女，王明华之子/女。
description.en: Great-grandchild of Wang Jinmei and child of Wang Minghua.

nodes.id: 山东省立第一师范学校

zh-cn: 山东省立第一师范学校

description.zh-cn: 位于济南的一所师范学校，王尽美曾在此就读。
description.en: A normal school in Jinan where Wang Jinmei studied.

nodes.id: 北京大学马克思学说研究会

zh-cn: 北京大学马克思学说研究会

description.zh-cn: 中国最早的马克思主义研究团体之一，王尽美是其外埠会员。
description.en: One of the earliest Marxist research groups in China, of which Wang Jinmei was a non-local member.

description.zh-cn: 由王尽美、邓恩铭等人在济南发起的革命团体。
description.en: A revolutionary group in Jinan initiated by Wang Jinmei, Deng Enming, and others.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期地方组织之一，由王尽美和邓恩铭发起创建。
description.en: One of the early local organizations of the Communist Party of China, initiated and established by Wang Jinmei and Deng Enming.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，王尽美是其创始人之一。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China, of which Wang Jinmei was one of the founders.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山东的早期地方组织，王尽美曾任书记。
description.en: An early local organization of the Communist Party of China in Shandong, where Wang Jinmei served as secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党成立后领导工人运动的第一个公开机构，王尽美曾任山东分部主任。
description.en: The first public body to lead the workers' movement after the founding of the Communist Party of China. Wang Jinmei served as the director of its Shandong branch.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个主要政党，王尽美曾在第一次国共合作时期以个人身份加入。
description.en: A major political party in Chinese history, which Wang Jinmei joined in his individual capacity during the First United Front.

nodes.id: 中共山东地方执行委员会

zh-cn: 中共山东地方执行委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山东的地方领导机构，王尽美曾任书记。
description.en: The local leading body of the Communist Party of China in Shandong, where Wang Jinmei served as secretary.

description.zh-cn: 王尽美在青岛组织的旨在促进国民会议召开的团体。
description.en: An association organized by Wang Jinmei in Qingdao to promote the convening of a National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的地方政府机构，曾逮捕并关押王尽美。
description.en: A local government body during the Republic of China era, which arrested and imprisoned Wang Jinmei.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在吉林省的军事领导指挥机关，王乃征曾在此担任副司令员。
description.en: The military leadership and command organ of the People's Liberation Army in Jilin Province, where Wang Naizheng served as deputy commander.

description.zh-cn: 由王尽美之子王乃征在其家乡北杏村组织成立的中国共产党基层组织。
description.en: A grassroots organization of the Communist Party of China established by Wang Jinmei's son, Wang Naizheng, in their hometown of Beixing Village.

nodes.id: 上海市交通工作委员会

zh-cn: 上海市交通工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 上海市负责交通工作的党委机构，王乃恩曾在此担任党委副书记。
description.en: The party committee responsible for transportation work in Shanghai, where Wang Nai'en served as deputy party secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所著名大学，王尽美的孙子王明华在此担任教授。
description.en: A renowned university in China where Wang Jinmei's grandson, Wang Minghua, is a professor.

nodes.id: 解放军第二军医大学长征医院

zh-cn: 解放军第二军医大学长征医院
第二军医大学长征医院

description.zh-cn: 位于上海的一所军队医院，王尽美的孙女王爱华在此担任教授。
description.en: A military hospital in Shanghai where Wang Jinmei's granddaughter, Wang Aihua, is a professor.

description.zh-cn: 1919年发生于中国的反帝反封建的爱国运动，王尽美是山东学生运动的负责人之一。
description.en: An anti-imperialist and anti-feudal patriotic movement that took place in China in 1919. Wang Jinmei was one of the leaders of the student movement in Shandong.

nodes.id: 山海关、秦皇岛罢工运动

zh-cn: 山海关、秦皇岛罢工运动

description.zh-cn: 王尽美在山海关、秦皇岛等地领导的工人罢工运动。
description.en: Workers' strike movements led by Wang Jinmei in places like Shanhaiguan and Qinhuangdao.

description.zh-cn: 由王尽美和邓恩铭共同领导的胶济铁路工人大罢工。
description.en: A major strike by workers of the Jiaoji Railway, co-led by Wang Jinmei and Deng Enming.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第一次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第一次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的成立大会，王尽美作为山东代表出席。
description.en: The founding congress of the Communist Party of China, which Wang Jinmei attended as a delegate from Shandong.

nodes.id: 远东各国共产党和民族革命团体第一次代表大会

zh-cn: 远东各国共产党和民族革命团体第一次代表大会
en: First Congress of the Toilers of the Far East

description.zh-cn: 在莫斯科召开的国际会议，王尽美出席并受到列宁接见。
description.en: An international conference held in Moscow, which Wang Jinmei attended and was received by Lenin.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二次全国代表大会，王尽美出席了会议。
description.en: The Second National Congress of the Communist Party of China, which Wang Jinmei attended.

nodes.id: 中国国民党第一次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国国民党第一次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 标志第一次国共合作正式形成的重要会议，王尽美赴广州参加。
description.en: An important conference marking the formal establishment of the First United Front, which Wang Jinmei attended in Guangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第四次全国代表大会，王尽美赴上海出席。
description.en: The Fourth National Congress of the Communist Party of China, which Wang Jinmei attended in Shanghai.

nodes.id: 国民会议促进会全国代表大会

zh-cn: 国民会议促进会全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 王尽美于1925年3月1日赴北京参加的会议。
description.en: A conference that Wang Jinmei attended in Beijing on March 1, 1925.

description.zh-cn: 一种慢性传染病，王尽美因罹患此病而英年早逝。
description.en: A chronic infectious disease that led to the early death of Wang Jinmei.

description.zh-cn: 位于山东省的县，是王尽美的出生地。
description.en: A county in Shandong Province, which is the birthplace of Wang Jinmei.

description.zh-cn: 位于山东省的沿海城市，是王尽美的逝世地。
description.en: A coastal city in Shandong Province, where Wang Jinmei passed away.

description.zh-cn: 王尽美于1898年6月14日生于山东莒县北杏村。
description.en: Wang Jinmei was born in Beixing Village, Ju County, Shandong on June 14, 1898.

relationships.target: 山东省立第一师范学校

description.zh-cn: 1918年夏，王尽美考入济南山东省立第一师范学校预科班。
description.en: In the summer of 1918, Wang Jinmei was admitted to the preparatory class of Shandong Provincial No. 1 Normal School in Jinan.

position.zh-cn: 山东大专中学学生联合会负责人
position.en: Leader of the Shandong Federation of Students from Colleges and Secondary Schools

description.zh-cn: 王尽美在1919年参加五四运动，是山东学生运动的负责人之一。
description.en: Wang Jinmei participated in the May Fourth Movement in 1919 and was one of the leaders of the student movement in Shandong.

relationships.target: 北京大学马克思学说研究会

description.zh-cn: 1920年3月，王尽美成为北京大学马克思学说研究会的外埠会员。
description.en: In March 1920, Wang Jinmei became a non-local member of the Peking University Marxist Theory Research Society.

description.zh-cn: 1920年秋，王尽美与邓恩铭等人发起成立励新学会。
description.en: In the autumn of 1920, Wang Jinmei, along with Deng Enming and others, initiated the establishment of the Lixin Society.

description.zh-cn: 1920年秋，邓恩铭与王尽美等人发起成立励新学会。
description.en: In the autumn of 1920, Deng Enming, along with Wang Jinmei and others, initiated the establishment of the Lixin Society.

description.zh-cn: 1921年春，王尽美与邓恩铭发起创建济南共产主义小组。
description.en: In the spring of 1921, Wang Jinmei and Deng Enming initiated the creation of the Jinan Communist Group.

description.zh-cn: 1921年春，邓恩铭与王尽美发起创建济南共产主义小组。
description.en: In the spring of 1921, Deng Enming and Wang Jinmei initiated the creation of the Jinan Communist Group.

description.zh-cn: 王尽美作为创始人之一，出席了1921年7月的中国共产党第一次全国代表大会。
description.en: As one of the founders, Wang Jinmei attended the First National Congress of the Communist Party of China in July 1921.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第一次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 1921年7月，王尽美赴上海出席中国共产党第一次全国代表大会。
description.en: In July 1921, Wang Jinmei went to Shanghai to attend the First National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中共一大后，王尽美任中共山东区支部书记。
description.en: After the First National Congress of the CCP, Wang Jinmei served as the secretary of the CCP Shandong District Branch.

description.zh-cn: 中共一大后，王尽美任中国劳动组合书记部山东分部主任。
description.en: After the First National Congress of the CCP, Wang Jinmei served as the Director of the Shandong Branch of the China Labour Union Secretariat.

relationships.target: 远东各国共产党和民族革命团体第一次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 1922年1月，王尽美赴莫斯科参加远东各国共产党和民族革命团体第一次代表大会。
description.en: In January 1922, Wang Jinmei went to Moscow to attend the First Congress of the Toilers of the Far East.

description.zh-cn: 1922年1月，王尽美在莫斯科参加远东各国共产党和民族革命团体第一次代表大会期间，受到列宁的接见。
description.en: In January 1922, during his attendance at the First Congress of the Toilers of the Far East in Moscow, Wang Jinmei was received by Lenin.

description.zh-cn: 1922年7月，王尽美在上海出席中共二大。
description.en: In July 1922, Wang Jinmei attended the Second National Congress of the CCP in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中共二大后，王尽美与邓中夏一起负责中国劳动组合书记部的领导工作。
description.en: After the Second National Congress of the CCP, Wang Jinmei and Deng Zhongxia were jointly responsible for the leadership of the China Labour Union Secretariat.

relationships.target: 山海关、秦皇岛罢工运动

description.zh-cn: 1922年11月后，王尽美在山海关、秦皇岛等地领导了罢工运动。
description.en: After November 1922, Wang Jinmei led strike movements in places like Shanhaiguan and Qinhuangdao.

description.zh-cn: 1923年2月，王尽美在山海关被逮捕，后被关押在临榆县。
description.en: In February 1923, Wang Jinmei was arrested in Shanhaiguan and subsequently imprisoned in Linyu County.

description.zh-cn: 1923年10月，王尽美以个人身份加入中国国民党。
description.en: In October 1923, Wang Jinmei joined the Kuomintang in his individual capacity.

relationships.target: 中国国民党第一次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 1924年1月，王尽美赴广州参加中国国民党第一次全国代表大会。
description.en: In January 1924, Wang Jinmei went to Guangzhou to attend the First National Congress of the Kuomintang.

relationships.target: 中共山东地方执行委员会

description.zh-cn: 1924年11月，王尽美任中共山东地方执行委员会书记。
description.en: In November 1924, Wang Jinmei served as the secretary of the CCP Shandong Local Executive Committee.

description.zh-cn: 孙中山约见王尽美后，以个人名义委派他为国民会议宣传员特派员。
description.en: After meeting with Wang Jinmei, Sun Yat-sen personally appointed him as a special commissioner for promoting the National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 1925年1月，王尽美赴上海出席中共四大。
description.en: In January 1925, Wang Jinmei went to Shanghai to attend the Fourth National Congress of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 1925年2月，王尽美抱病组织了青岛国民会议促成会。
description.en: In February 1925, despite his illness, Wang Jinmei organized the Qingdao National Assembly Promotion Association.

description.zh-cn: 1925年2月，王尽美与邓恩铭共同领导了胶济铁路工人罢工。
description.en: In February 1925, Wang Jinmei and Deng Enming co-led the Jiaoji Railway workers' strike.

description.zh-cn: 1925年2月，邓恩铭与王尽美共同领导了胶济铁路工人罢工。
description.en: In February 1925, Deng Enming and Wang Jinmei co-led the Jiaoji Railway workers' strike.

relationships.target: 国民会议促进会全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 1925年3月1日，王尽美去北京参加国民会议促进会全国代表大会。
description.en: On March 1, 1925, Wang Jinmei went to Beijing to attend the National Congress of the National Assembly Promotion Association.

description.zh-cn: 王尽美因肺结核病情恶化，于1925年8月19日在青岛病逝。
description.en: Due to the worsening of his tuberculosis, Wang Jinmei passed away in Qingdao on August 19, 1925.

description.zh-cn: 王乃征是王尽美的长子。
description.en: Wang Naizheng is the eldest son of Wang Jinmei.

description.zh-cn: 王乃恩是王尽美的次子。
description.en: Wang Nai'en is the second son of Wang Jinmei.

description.zh-cn: 王乃征和王乃恩是兄弟关系。
description.en: Wang Naizheng and Wang Nai'en are brothers.

description.zh-cn: 1938年初，董昆一和赵志刚介绍王乃征加入中国共产党。
description.en: In early 1938, Dong Kunyi and Zhao Zhigang introduced Wang Naizheng to join the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1938年初，赵志刚和董昆一介绍王乃征加入中国共产党。
description.en: In early 1938, Zhao Zhigang and Dong Kunyi introduced Wang Naizheng to join the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1938年，王乃征在家乡北杏村组织成立了中共北杏支部。
description.en: In 1938, Wang Naizheng organized and established the CCP Beixing Branch in his hometown of Beixing Village.

description.zh-cn: 王乃征曾任吉林省军区副司令员。
description.en: Wang Naizheng served as the deputy commander of the Jilin Provincial Military District.

description.zh-cn: 王军是王乃征的儿子。
description.en: Wang Jun is the son of Wang Naizheng.

description.zh-cn: 王毅是王乃征的儿子。
description.en: Wang Yi is the son of Wang Naizheng.

description.zh-cn: 王枫是王乃征的女儿。
description.en: Wang Feng is the daughter of Wang Naizheng.

description.zh-cn: 王军和王毅是兄弟关系。
description.en: Wang Jun and Wang Yi are brothers.

description.zh-cn: 王军和王枫是兄妹关系。
description.en: Wang Jun and Wang Feng are siblings.

description.zh-cn: 王毅和王枫是兄妹关系。
description.en: Wang Yi and Wang Feng are siblings.

relationships.target: 上海市交通工作委员会

position.en: Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 王乃恩曾任上海市交通工作委员会党委副书记。
description.en: Wang Nai'en served as the Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee of the Shanghai Municipal Transportation Work Committee.

description.zh-cn: 王明华是王乃恩的儿子。
description.en: Wang Minghua is the son of Wang Nai'en.

description.zh-cn: 王立华是王乃恩的子女。
description.en: Wang Lihua is the child of Wang Nai'en.

description.zh-cn: 王建华是王乃恩的子女。
description.en: Wang Jianhua is the child of Wang Nai'en.

description.zh-cn: 王爱华是王乃恩的女儿。
description.en: Wang Aihua is the daughter of Wang Nai'en.

description.zh-cn: 王明华和王立华是兄弟姐妹关系。
description.en: Wang Minghua and Wang Lihua are siblings.

description.zh-cn: 王明华和王建华是兄弟姐妹关系。
description.en: Wang Minghua and Wang Jianhua are siblings.

description.zh-cn: 王明华和王爱华是兄妹关系。
description.en: Wang Minghua and Wang Aihua are siblings.

description.zh-cn: 王立华和王建华是兄弟姐妹关系。
description.en: Wang Lihua and Wang Jianhua are siblings.

description.zh-cn: 王立华和王爱华是兄弟姐妹关系。
description.en: Wang Lihua and Wang Aihua are siblings.

description.zh-cn: 王建华和王爱华是兄弟姐妹关系。
description.en: Wang Jianhua and Wang Aihua are siblings.

position.zh-cn: 信息学院信电系微电子与光电子研究所教授
position.en: Professor at the Institute of Microelectronics and Optoelectronics, Department of Information and Electronic Engineering, College of Information Science and Electronic Engineering

description.zh-cn: 王明华是浙江大学信息学院信电系微电子与光电子研究所教授。
description.en: Wang Minghua is a professor at the Institute of Microelectronics and Optoelectronics, Department of Information and Electronic Engineering, College of Information Science and Electronic Engineering, Zhejiang University.

description.zh-cn: 王继红是王明华的子女。
description.en: Wang Jihong is the child of Wang Minghua.

description.zh-cn: 王继梅是王明华的子女。
description.en: Wang Jimei is the child of Wang Minghua.

description.zh-cn: 王继红和王继梅是兄弟姐妹关系。
description.en: Wang Jihong and Wang Jimei are siblings.

relationships.target: 解放军第二军医大学长征医院

description.zh-cn: 王爱华是解放军第二军医大学长征医院教授。
description.en: Wang Aihua is a professor at Changzheng Hospital, Second Military Medical University.
